Read-eval-print loop for the life plan api

Key bindings for the used command line editor can be found at https://github.com/jangko/nim-noise. Compile with -d:esc_exit_editing, or: --define:esc_exit_editing

proc errorMessage(message: string) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Prints an (error) message to the screen prefixed by the word error printed in red.
